intro: Ixora lucida, commonly known as the bright flame or flame tree, is a tropical shrub or small tree native to Southeast Asia. It is characterized by its showy, clustered inflorescences of bright red or orange flowers that bloom throughout the year. The plant has simple, opposite, elliptical leaves that are glossy and dark green. It thrives in full sun and well-drained soil, making it a popular ornamental plant in warm climates. Ixora lucida is also valued for its ability to attract pollinators such as bees and birds.
